Submit to Speak

You, yes you, definitely have a great idea for a workshop!

Submit your workshop proposal for the Ada Lovelace Conference! We are looking for talks that are hands-on, accomplish a goal, and are at the intermediate or advanced level.

If you are interested in presenting, please fill out the form below with: 1) proposed name for your workshop, 2) one to two sentence synopsis, 3) description of your experience presenting or in that field, and 4) outline of the workshop.


Submit your workshop
